slide1.title: Unique content in various formats
slide1.subTitle: Texts, illustrations, video, and assignments with comprehensive solution explanation

slide2.title: Personal approach
slide2.subTitle: Content delivery adapts to your studying progress. You'll see only what you're interested in

slide3.title: Analytics
slide3.subTitle: Track your study records. Learn what content is more interesting

blockEmpty.title: No chapters
blockEmpty.description: At the moment, no chapters have been added on this subject.

empty.title1: Unfortunately, we couldn't find anything on the request
empty.subTitle: Try to optimize your search. Here are some suggestions:
empty.li1: Make sure that all the words are spelled correctly
empty.li3: Try using more general search queries

modal.greetingText: Are you ready to dive into the limitless possibilities and improve your experience? Let's learn the basics together so that you can enjoy all the benefits of our product.

onboarding.objective: Distinctive features of representatives of the 5 kingdoms of the living

post.titleImage: Gravity: The Force Uniting the Universe
post.descriptionImage: The gravitational laws discovered by Isaac Newton describe the interaction of masses in the universe. This force not only keeps us on Earth, but also controls the movement of planets and stars.
post.titleVideo: What caused Galileo to doubt the truth of Aristotle's statements?
post.descriptionVideo: Galileo's process of doubting Aristotle's teachings began when he began observing celestial objects through a telescope that had just been invented
post.activityQuestion: What is mechanical energy and what are its two types?
post.option1: This is the sum of kinetic and potential energy.
post.option2: This is the sum of the energy of motion and the energy of heat.
post.option3: This is the sum of the energy of motion and the energy of light
post.option4: This is the sum of the energy of light and the energy of heat

step1.title: Filter by subject
step1.paragraph: Move freely and choose subjects to study or pull up.

step2.title: Feed of a subject
step2.paragraph: It consists of posts with videos and pictures, after studying which, there is an activity for fixing

step3.title: Menu progress
step3.paragraph: Which shows which section and topic you are currently studying

step4.title: Filter by post type
step4.paragraph: You can choose the type of post you prefer. Videos or pictures, or leave both options.

step5.title: Actions
step5.paragraph: You can like and bookmark posts. They will be saved in your profile.

step6.title: The learn more button
step6.paragraph: If you want to explore the topic in more detail, click on the “Learn more” button

step7.title: Activity
step7.paragraph: These are tasks for securing posts above.

step8.title: Hints
step8.paragraph: They will help you choose the right option

step9.title: Multiple activites
step9.paragraph: There are several activities, you can use the carousel to view each one.

step1011.title: Performing activation
step1011.paragraph: After completing the activation, a star about the completed activation lights up in your progress menu

step12.title: Assessment
step12.paragraph: At the end of each topic, you will have an assessment for the topic. Where all the questions on the passed topic will be collected.

step13.title: Passing the assessment
step13.paragraph: Gives you access to a new section! where you can learn new material.

step14.title: Функционал прогресс меню
step14.paragraph: The functionality of the progress menu

step15.title: Moving between topics
step15.paragraph: You can open any topic in the section.

step16.title: The topic is passed
step16.paragraph: When the assessment for the topic is completed.

step17.title: The assessment for the section is closed
step17.paragraph: Until you complete all the assessment on the topicsa

step18.title: The Assessment Is Open
step18.paragraph: After completing the assessment, the following section will be available for you to study.
